/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's daily hustle and bustle. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that rise in the background. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the busy scene below. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky standing out against the more muted tones of the buildings.
